      • toJSONFormat

        public static java.lang.String toJSONFormat(ClusterElement c)
        Parameters:
        c - ClusterElement a Cluster to transform
        Returns:
        a JSON Array of Rows with single Clusters firstrow = header cols: 0 = id of the cluster 1 = name of the cluster 2 = parent cluster (id) 3 = size 4 = sentiments value 5 = sentiments range 6 = posts belonging to the cluster
